item.question: The Cebuano speaker asks the soldier his name. - True

item.question: The soldier uses the greeting, "Good morning." - False
item.feedback: Correct. The soldier greets the Cebuano speaker with the customary afternoon greeting, Maayong hapon. (Good afternoon.)

item.question: The Cebuano speaker identifies the man in the photograph. - False
item.hint: When asked the identity of the man, the Cebuano speaker says, Ambot.
item.feedback: Correct. The Cebuano speaker replies Ambot (I don't know) when asked, Kinsa man ning lalakiha? (Who is this man?)

item.question: The soldier declines the Cebuano speaker's offer of more food. - True
item.hint: Review the soldier's response to the Cebuano speaker's offer: Salamat, dili na, busog na ko.
item.feedback: Correct. The soldier respectfully declines by saying, Salamat, dili na, busog na ko. (No, thank you, I am full.)
